summary: Just to let you know, I found lists of celebrations for each month. I’m going to try to make Dan and Phil edits for each day. Of...
caption: Just to let you know, I found lists of celebrations for each month. I’m going to try to make Dan and Phil edits for each day. Of course I’ll miss a few! If you all want to join in on the fun, I’d love to see what you all create ❤️❤️❤️

reblog.comment: Just to let you know, I found lists of celebrations for each month. I’m going to try to make Dan and Phil edits for each day. Of course I’ll miss a few! If you all want to join in on the fun, I’d love to see what you all create ❤️❤️❤️

trail.content_raw: Just to let you know, I found lists of celebrations for each month. I’m going to try to make Dan and Phil edits for each day. Of course I’ll miss a few! If you all want to join in on the fun, I’d love to see what you all create ❤️❤️❤️
trail.content: Just to let you know, I found lists of celebrations for each month. I’m going to try to make Dan and Phil edits for each day. Of course I’ll miss a few! If you all want to join in on the fun, I’d love to see what you all create ❤️❤️❤️

blog.name: phanfeed-ao3
blog.title: Phanfiction!
blog.description:
!!! READ THE FAQ BEFORE SENDING ME AN ASK !!!

Mobile Links

This blog is autoposts anything that gets put in the Dan Howell/Phil Lester tag on Archive of Our Own (AO3).

Sometimes the applet on IFTT I use straight up breaks. I don't recommend turning on notifications for this blog. Links don't work on mobile.

Admin: Ozzy (foolishdeadbeat)

blog.name: dramaphan
blog.title: Yo I Comment On The Drama When Shit Hits The Fan
blog.description:
Phandom drama? It's more likely than you think.

.

My ask box is always open if you need a place to be dramatic, share theories, conspiracies, opinions, or general grievances. Fire away, my babies. Nothing is off limits. (Except for the things that are.)

.

Icon by phanniephobic, header by cinnamonnutlester

summary: I don’t get why people are getting so worked up about them spending time apart. They just did a whole tour together. Why is it...
question: I don’t get why people are getting so worked up about them spending time apart. They just did a whole tour together. Why is it weird for them to spend some time with their families?
answer:
Anon don’t you know that best friends never spend time away from each other? Like ever? You’re telling me you actually leave your best friends side? Smh, fake friends.


And I mean what if they’re a couple? Couples aren’t legally allowed to not be in the same room. Much less in different parts of the country. They’ve obviously broken up. Or they’re fighting. And they need to reunite as soon as possible because they can’t handle being by themselves.

reblog.comment:
Anon don’t you know that best friends never spend time away from each other? Like ever? You’re telling me you actually leave your best friends side? Smh, fake friends.


And I mean what if they’re a couple? Couples aren’t legally allowed to not be in the same room. Much less in different parts of the country. They’ve obviously broken up. Or they’re fighting. And they need to reunite as soon as possible because they can’t handle being by themselves.

trail.content_raw:
Anon don’t you know that best friends never spend time away from each other? Like ever? You’re telling me you actually leave your best friends side? Smh, fake friends.


And I mean what if they’re a couple? Couples aren’t legally allowed to not be in the same room. Much less in different parts of the country. They’ve obviously broken up. Or they’re fighting. And they need to reunite as soon as possible because they can’t handle being by themselves.
trail.content:

summary: Sometimes I wonder how phil feels about all the speculation and drama. We've seen bits and pieces of how Dan feels since he's a...
question: Sometimes I wonder how phil feels about all the speculation and drama. We've seen bits and pieces of how Dan feels since he's a bit more opinionated/outspoken but it seems like Phil mostly ignores it all. It would be interesting to see him express how he really feels about things.
answer: I feel like Phil is too much of a people pleaser. He wouldn’t want to upset anyone, so he seems to just stay quiet and pretend it’s not happening. But like what if he just totally turned the filter off one day? What would we get? It’s definitely interesting to think about.

reblog.comment: I feel like Phil is too much of a people pleaser. He wouldn’t want to upset anyone, so he seems to just stay quiet and pretend it’s not happening. But like what if he just totally turned the filter off one day? What would we get? It’s definitely interesting to think about.

trail.content_raw: I feel like Phil is too much of a people pleaser. He wouldn’t want to upset anyone, so he seems to just stay quiet and pretend it’s not happening. But like what if he just totally turned the filter off one day? What would we get? It’s definitely interesting to think about.
trail.content: I feel like Phil is too much of a people pleaser. He wouldn’t want to upset anyone, so he seems to just stay quiet and pretend it’s not happening. But like what if he just totally turned the filter off one day? What would we get? It’s definitely interesting to think about.

summary:
The only reason I'm sad Phil isn't with Dan is because I want to see Dan and Phil together with Colin. 
But maybe I should be...

The only reason I’m sad Phil isn’t with Dan is because I want to see Dan and Phil together with Colin.

But maybe I should be thankful, a picture like that would have killed me 😭❤
